statements: SELECT * FROM LivestockFeedData
SELECT LivestockName, FeedType, Quantity FROM LivestockFeedData
SELECT ID, NutritionValue, DateRecorded FROM LivestockFeedData
SELECT LivestockName, Quantity, FeedType FROM LivestockFeedData WHERE Quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM LivestockFeedData WHERE DateRecorded > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM LivestockFeedData WHERE Quantity > 100 ORDER BY DateRecorded DESC
SELECT LivestockName, FeedType, NutritionValue FROM LivestockFeedData WHERE NutritionValue >= 10.5
SELECT LivestockName, Quantity, DateRecorded FROM LivestockFeedData WHERE FeedType = 'Hay' ORDER BY Quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM LivestockFeedData WHERE LivestockName = 'Cow' AND DateRecorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT AVG(NutritionValue) AS AverageNutrition, MAX(Quantity) AS MaxQuantity FROM LivestockFeedData WHERE FeedType = 'Grain'
SELECT * FROM feed_data ORDER BY protein_content DESC, id ASC;
SELECT group_name, average_weight FROM livestock_group WHERE average_weight > 500;
SELECT feed_name, carbohydrate_content FROM feed_data WHERE protein_content > 15 ORDER BY feed_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_group WHERE feed_id IS NULL;
SELECT group_name, average_weight FROM livestock_group WHERE feed_id IN (SELECT id FROM feed_data WHERE protein_content < 10);
SELECT * FROM feed_data WHERE protein_content > 10 AND carbohydrate_content < 5 ORDER BY feed_name DESC;
SELECT feed_name, protein_content FROM feed_data WHERE protein_content < 15 AND carbohydrate_content > 8 ORDER BY protein_content ASC;
SELECT * FROM feed_data WHERE protein_content >= 12.5 AND carbohydrate_content <= 7.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT group_name, average_weight FROM livestock_group WHERE average_weight BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY average_weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_group lg JOIN feed_data fd ON lg.feed_id = fd.id WHERE fd.protein_content > 14 AND fd.carbohydrate_content < 6 ORDER BY fd.protein_content DESC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockGroup;
SELECT group_name FROM LivestockGroup WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT feed_name, protein_content, moisture_content FROM FeedData WHERE energy_content > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM NutritionData WHERE amount > 100 AND timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT group_id, AVG(amount) as average_amount FROM NutritionData GROUP BY group_id;
SELECT * FROM LivestockGroup WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT group_name FROM LivestockGroup WHERE group_name = 'Cows';
SELECT feed_name, protein_content FROM FeedData WHERE protein_content > 10 ORDER BY feed_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM NutritionData WHERE group_id = 2 AND amount >= 5.0;
SELECT nutrition_id, timestamp FROM NutritionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM feed_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feed_name, energy_content FROM feed_data WHERE protein_content > 20 ORDER BY protein_content ASC;
SELECT feed_name, protein_content, fiber_content FROM feed_data WHERE energy_content < 100 ORDER BY fiber_content DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT group_name, average_weight FROM group_livestock WHERE average_age > 5 ORDER BY average_weight DESC;

SELECT f.feed_name, g.group_name FROM feed_data f INNER JOIN feed_group_mapping m ON f.id = m.feed_id INNER JOIN group_livestock g ON m.group_id = g.group_id ORDER BY f.feed_name ASC, g.group_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM feed_data WHERE protein_content > 10.00
SELECT feed_name, energy_content FROM feed_data ORDER BY energy_content DESC
SELECT feed_name, fiber_content FROM feed_data WHERE fiber_content < 5.00
SELECT f.feed_name, g.group_name FROM feed_data f JOIN feed_group_mapping m ON f.id = m.feed_id JOIN group_livestock g ON m.group_id = g.group_id
SELECT livestock_name, species, weight FROM livestock WHERE age > 2 ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT name, age FROM Livestock WHERE breed = 'Angus';
SELECT id, breed FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY breed DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feed WHERE type IN ('Grass', 'Hay') AND protein > 10;
SELECT name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Nutrition GROUP BY name HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100;
SELECT * FROM Livestock ORDER BY age DESC, weight ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, breed FROM Livestock WHERE age > 2 AND breed = 'Angus';
SELECT name, type, protein, fat FROM Feed WHERE type = 'Grain' ORDER BY protein DESC, fat ASC;

SELECT Group.name, Group.total_livestock, AVG(Livestock.age) AS average_age, AVG(Livestock.weight) AS average_weight FROM Group LEFT JOIN Livestock ON Group.id = Livestock.id GROUP BY Group.name, Group.total_livestock;

SELECT Nutrition.date, Group.name, Livestock.name, Feed.name, Nutrition.quantity FROM Nutrition INNER JOIN Group_Nutrition ON Nutrition.id = Group_Nutrition.nutrition_id INNER JOIN Group ON Group.id = Group_Nutrition.group_id INNER JOIN Livestock ON Nutrition.livestock_id = Livestock.id INNER JOIN Feed ON Nutrition.feed_id = Feed.id ORDER BY Nutrition.date DESC LIMIT 10;
